document_data.name: Qlogru
document_data.mainbody: addition to typical illithid abilities, they were a powerful arcane spellcaster, and were served by various creatures including [[water elemental]]s and [[skeleton]]s.
document_data.Abilities: In addition to typical illithid abilities, they were a powerful arcane spellcaster, and were served by various creatures including [[water elemental]]s and [[skeleton]]s.
document_data.History: Qlogru lurked near the [[drow]] city of [[Sschindylryn]] in the [[Underdark]] around the time of their [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar|invasion of Eveningstar]].
